attributes.action: reduce the cost of bank charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the amount banks charge us nowadays i feel is scandalous. most of us have read that it costs a bank between £2.50 and £4.50 to send out a letter, which i think is a fair reflection.
but as most of us get charged around £30.00 to £35.00 which basically is legal robbery
please sign and encourage our government to do something about it
